description:
Chloe is an anime-original character. She is a villager of Pasroe and has known Lawrence for a long time. In fact, Lawrence taught her how to be a merchant. Despite still not knowing how she should feel about him, she respects him as her teacher and a good friend. [Spoiler]They later break off their friendship when Chloe allies with the church to capture and kill Holo.[/Spoiler]
(Wikipedia)
name: Chloe
